Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Reroute at Montrose/Western
ShortDescription: 78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted via Montrose, Western, Irving Park, California and Montrose due to a street blockage near Montrose/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted via Montrose, Western, Irving Park, California and Montrose due to a street blockage near Montrose/Western.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #68 Northwest Highway Temporary Northbound Reroute near Summit/Touhy
ShortDescription: NB 68 Northwest Highway buses are temporarily rerouted via Summit, Prospect, Northwest Hwy and Washington due to, street blockage near Summit/Touhy.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #68 Northwest Highway buses are temporarily rerouted via Summit, Prospect, Northwest Highway and Washington due to, street blockage near Summit/Touhy.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/37th-Pershing
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 35th, Wallace, 39th and Halsted due to, street blockage near Halsted/37th-Pershing.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, 35th, Wallace, 39th and Halsted due to, street blockage near Halsted/37th-Pershing.

Allow extra travel time.
